name: Monster 666 V.0.1
description:
A Very Early Build Of A Project I'm Working On. Also My First Game!


Story:

This Is Set In A World Where 1000 Different Types Of Monsters Exist. The Main Character Is Monster Type 666, A Demon. However He Does Not Act As A Demon Instead He Is Kind And Loving. Explore His Island. Read The Signs. Maybe Find Out He Isn't As Alone As He Thinks He Is.

Info: 

I Am A Single Man Team Making This. It Was Produced With The Help Of RPG Maker VX Ace. You Can See The Full Credits At The End Of The Game. (Which shouldn't take long to get to lol). And Finally. PLEASE PLEASE do not donate. the finished piece will even be free I do not wanna make profit off of this. IT IS COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY. I am making this BECAUSE I wanted to do something nice for people. Cloua is still in high development and currently as of writing this Cloua is  the latest area added. When I Say VERY EARLY I Mean Like Bout Just An Hour Of Work.
